basicInfo.desc: This Task returns the binary image data for a graph in a Report Writer document.

parameter.name: width
parameter.desc: Specifies the width (in pixels) of the graph image.

parameter.name: height
parameter.desc: Specifies the height (in pixels) of the graph image.

parameter.name: messageID
parameter.desc: The Message ID for the previously executed Report Writer document. It is optional if a GraphBean state is provided.

parameter.name: imgType
parameter.desc: The type of image desired. See com.microstrategy.webapi.EnumDSSXMLGraphImgTypes for possible values. This value is optional if the caller provides a previous GraphBean state.

parameter.name: nodeKey
parameter.desc: The key of the template node whose graph should be generated. This value is optional if the caller provides a previous GraphBean state.

parameter.name: sliceID
parameter.desc: The slice identifier of the template node whose graph should be generated. This value is optional if the caller provides a previous GraphBean state.
